```{r}
#install.packages("openalexR")

library(openalexR)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

query_author <- oa_query(
identifier = "A4355526848", #Christian Drosten /https://explore.openalex.org/authors/A4355526848
entity = "authors",
endpoint = "https://api.openalex.org"
)
res <- oa_request(
query_url = query_author,
count_only = FALSE,
verbose = FALSE)

df <- oa2df(res, entity = "authors")
```

## H-Index

```{r}
hindex <- function(x) {
    tx <- sort(x, decreasing = T)
    print(sum(tx >= seq_along(tx)))
}

hindex(c(1,2,3,4))
```
